segments.text: You already finished off everything , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like anything in particular ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Perrier and the Jim Beam . Let me have three more of each .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Beam and Perrier . Anything else , sir ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I really loved the apples in my room . Bring me a few more , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure thing . Might there by anything else ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes , speaking of fruit , bring me some grape juice , too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perrier , Jim Beam , apples , and grape juice . It will all be there shortly , sir .
segments.speaker: S2
